sub_title: Country Approval Associate at Thermofisher Scientific | Doctor in Nutrition & Metabolism | Vinyasa yoga teacher-RYT200
summary: I am a motivated scientist with interest for physiology, nutrition and molecular biology. I have recently transitioned to a new role to support clinical research and I am very much looking forward to the new challenges and to contribute to this field!

awards.title: Marie Skłodowska-Curie Individual Fellowship
awards.description: Global Fellowship within the Radboudumc (Ion Transport Group) and Jackson Laboratory (The Korstanje Lab). The project aims to elucidate the role of a novel protein involved in magnesium balance in the body.

profile_positions.description:
Fundamental research focused on unraveling the role of genes involved in magnesium transport in the kidney. Molecular and physiological protein characterisation.
> Mammalian cell lines
> Molecular cloning
> Protein and gene expression studies
> BSc and MSc thesis supervision
> Project management 
> Communication with stakeholders
> Grant and paper writing
> Statistical analysis
> Adobe illustrator graphical design
profile_positions.title: Marie Sklodowska-Curie Fellow - Personal fellowship

profile_positions.description:
Investigated the effects of vitamin B3 on hypothalamic NAD+ related pathways
> Mice studies, protein and gene expression analysis.
> Responsible for training staff on brain anatomy and cryosectioning 
> Student supervision and practical courses
> Initiator and manager of the instagram page @physiology.lab.wageningen with the aim of increasing visibility among students and researchers.
> Grant and article writing
> Results report in meetings and presentations
> Statistical analysis, graphpad
profile_positions.title: Visiting Postdoctoral Scholar

profile_positions.description:
Study of a mixture of bioactive compounds on the modulation of leptin signalling pathway in the hypothalamus
> Responsible for training staff on brain cryosectioning
> Brain cryosectioning, immunofluorescence and fluorescence microscopy
> Present results in international conferences and internal seminars
> Teaching of practical courses
> Project management
> Communication with international collaborators
profile_positions.title: Postdoctoral Research Scientist

profile_positions.description:
Thesis title: Polyphenol Effects on Central Leptin Sensitivity in Obesity
> Start of a new research line focused on hypothalamic leptin signaling and polyphenol effects in obesity
> Brought new knowledge about brain regulation of energy homeostasis
> Set up of new techniques: brain cryosectioning, immunofluorescence
> Optimisation of protocols of RNA and protein extraction for hypothalamus
> Rat and mice studies, metabolic monitoring
> Brain cell lines
> ELISA and colorimetric assays
> Gene and protein expression studies
> Statistic analysis, SPSS and graphpad
profile_positions.title: PhD candidate in the Nutrigenomics Research Group

profile_positions.description:
Internship in Xu Lab in the Diabetes Center of UCSF. Study of regulation of hepatic steatosis by hypothalamic neurons in physiologic conditions and in response to alcohol. 
> Mice monitoring of metabolic parameters
> Genotyping
> Protein and gene expression studies, optimisation RNAscope assays
> Brain cry-sectioning and immunofluorescence, fluorescence microscopy
> Presentation of results to different labs in UCSF
> Organization lab retreat
> Statistical analysis, graphpad
profile_positions.title: Visiting PhD candidate

profile_positions.description:
Study of the effects of grape seed proanthocyanidins on leptin resistance in a diet-induced obesity animal model.
> Start of a new research line: polyphenol effects on brain leptin signaling
> Protocol optimisation for brain samples
> Obtained first data about proanthocyanidin effects on hypothalamic gene expression
> PhD grant applications
profile_positions.title: Collaboration Grant. Nutrigenomics Research Group - Biochemistry and Biotechnology Department

profile_positions.description:
Northern Ireland Centre for Food&Health

SWAFAX project- Seaweed derived anti-inflammatory agents and antioxidants. (http://www.seaweedforhealth.org/swafax/)

Ileostomy Berry project – Tracking polyphenols from raspberries in ileal fluid and determination of the anti-genotoxic activity in colon cancer cell line.

Clinical Centre University of Sarajevo Internship

profile_positions.description: Analysis of hematological malignancies, infertility, and prenatal screening.

volunteer_experiences.role: Fundació Autònoma Solidària (FAS) - Academic Support to a disabled student

company.name: IFMSA - International Federation of Medical Students Association

volunteer_experiences.description:
Sarajevo University Clinical Center (KCUS) - Bosnia Herzegovina
Internship in the clinical immunology lab, helped with medical analysis of allergies, ELISA and acquired some knowledge about flow cytometry. 
Students from Bosnia Herzegovina were able to go to Barcelona and perform and internship in a hospital.

volunteer_experiences.role: Volunteer in India in women and children education program
volunteer_experiences.description: I was volunteering in a rural area at the surroundings of Jaipur, teaching English to woman between 16-30 years. It was a challenging experience since we had different levels. We decided to divide the class into basic level and intermediate level. This was a good way to get both groups motivated and learn easily. I was also with children doing handicrafts and playing games in order to learn English. It was a very fulfilling experience that I recommend a lot.

The Radboud Postdoc Initiative is a source of information regarding postdoc-related issues. In addition it creates a platform to facilitate discussions amongst postdocs and promotes local collaboration and networking opportunities.

volunteer_experiences.role: Co-Chair of the Radboudumc Postdoc Initiative
volunteer_experiences.description:
> Organise events, workshops and a retreat for the Postdocs of the Radboudumc. 
> Discuss relevant topics with Radboudumc Policy Makers to improve work conditions of postdocs
